subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Tiered usage limits; e.g., up to 80 messages every 3 hours on GPT-4o, with unlimited lower-tier models.
Estimated 5x the usage of the free tier, subject to fair use caps on message length and frequency.

pricing_analysis.most_efficient: DeepSeek Chat (for performance-tier models), Gemini 1.5 Flash (for speed-tier models)
pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: ~20% (estimated from industry reports among active users)
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression is the dominant trend, driven by new model releases (GPT-4o, DeepSeek V2) and competition. The market is stratifying into specialized tiers: 'Flash'/'Haiku' models for ultra-low-cost, high-speed tasks, and flagship models for complex reasoning. Subscriptions are standardizing consumer access, while API pricing for enterprises is becoming highly granular and competitive.
